DESCRIPTION: Counts monsters currently summoned. Maximum of #b5 Summons.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, adds #yrandomized monster cards to your hand. #yEvoke also adds #yrandomized monsters to your hand.

Certain cards (like Monster Reborn) allow you to Resummon monsters. When you Resummon a monster, it replays the card, ignoring #yTribute costs. Some monsters have extra effects that trigger when they are Resummoned.
Removes X #ySummons. Unless you have enough #ySummons to #yTribute, you cannot play a #yTribute card.
Increase your maximum #ySummons by the number given.
#yOrb: Increase your power stacks at the start of turn. #yEvoke gives random #ybuffs.
#yOrb: #ySummon #ySpellcater Tokens at the end of turn. #yEvoke increases your max #ySummons.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, increase the cards reduced when this is evoked. #yEvoke sets the cost of random card(s) in your hand to 0.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, adds #yrandomized #yDragon cards to your hand. #yEvoke sets the cost of random #yDragons in your hand to 0.
When a card with #yOverflow is in your hand at the end of the turn, activate an effect. This effect has a limited amount of uses.
Can only be played if #yToon #yWorld is active. If you Tribute a Toon monster using another Toon, deal #b5 damage to all enemies.
Tokens associated with the #yMagnet #yWarrior monsters. #yMagnets have no inherent effect.
Add #b2 #yrandomized cards to your hand, they cost #b0 this turn. Apply #b1 random #ybuff. Apply #b2 random #ydebuffs to an enemy.
When you #yTribute a #yDragon for another #yDragon, Gain #b1 #yStrength.
When you attack, if the only monsters you currently have summoned are #ySpellcasters, gain #b5 Block. You need to have summoned at least #b1 #ySpellcaster to trigger this effect.
When you #yTribute an #yInsect monster for an #yInsect or a #yPlant, apply #b3 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
When you #yTribute a #yPlant monster for an #yInsect or a #yPlant, apply #b3 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
#yPredaplant monsters are treated as #yPlants. When you #yTribute a #yPredaplant monster for an #yInsect or a #yPlant, apply #b3 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, adds #yrandomized #ySpell cards to your hand. #yEvoke also adds #yrandomized #ySpells to your hand.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a chance to #yChannel a random #yOrb. You have a higher chance if the only monsters you currently have summoned are #yDragons. #yEvoke increases your #yOrb slots by #b1.
#yOrb: When you draw #yDragons, reduces their #yTribute cost for that turn. When #yEvoked, reduces the #yTribute cost of #yDragons (everywhere) for the rest of combat.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, triggers a random action. #yEvoke also triggers random actions.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, have a #b20% chance to #ySummon a [#FF5252]Shadow [#FF5252]Token. #yEvoke: #yResummon monsters from your discard pile on random enemies.
#yOrb: When you draw #yAquas, reduces their #yTribute cost for that turn. When #yEvoked, increases the number of #ySummons of ALL #yAqua monsters for the rest of combat.
When you #yResummon a #yZombie, gain #b10 Block.
When you #yTribute a #yFiend for another #yFiend, place #b1 card from your discard pile into your hand.
When you #yTribute an #yAqua for another #yAqua, add a #yrandomized #yAqua monster to your hand.
#yRandomized cards may have their costs changed, #yTribute costs reduced, #ySummons increased, may #yExhaust, and may become #yUpgraded or #yEthereal.
Cannot be #yResummoned.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, heal #b1 HP for each monster summoned this combat. NL #yEvoke: Heal #b3 HP for each monster summoned this combat.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, #yTribute #b2 and gain temporary HP equal to the total energy cost of all tributes. NL #yEvoke: #yTribute ALL summons, gain a random #yBuff equal to the amount tributed.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add a #yRandomized #yTrap to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Play a random #yTrap you have played this run on a random enemy.
#yOrb: Whenever you draw a #yZombie, reduce the #yTribute cost by #b1 for this combat. NL #yEvoke: Deal a random amount of damage to a random enemy. Deals more damage with a higher evoke amount.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, activate the #yMillennium #yPuzzle. NL #yEvoke: Choose and add X #yrandomized cards from your deck pool into your hand.
#yOrb: At the end of turn, gain #yBlock equal to the number of #ySpells played this combat plus #b1. NL #yEvoke: Gain #yMetallicize #b2.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, add a #yRandomized #yPlant or #yInsect to your hand. NL #yEvoke: Increase the summons of all #yInsect and #yPlant monsters (everywhere) by 1 for this combat.

#yOrb: At the start of turn, add a #yRandomized #yAqua monster to your hand. NL #yPassive: At the end of turn, increase the summons of all #yAqua monsters in your hand, discard pile, and exhaust pile by #b1. NL #yEvoke: #yTribute all #yAqua monsters and #ySummon a random monster for each. Gain a random #yBuff equal to the amount of #yAqua monsters #yTributed.
#yOrb: At the start of turn, apply #b1 #ySlow to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Apply #b4 #ySlow to ALL enemies.
#yOrb: Whenver you draw a monster, increase the #yTribute cost by #b4 and increase the damage by #b12 for this turn. NL #yEvoke: #yIncrement #b5.

#yOrb: Adds #yRandomized Power cards to your hand at the start of turn. NL #yEvoke: If you have any empty Orb slots, consume one and reduce the #yTribute cost of all monsters in your draw pile by #b1.
#yInvert is the same as #yEvoke, except that you also #yChannel an Orb that is the 'opposite' of the one you #yEvoked.
Whenever you #ySummon a #yNaturia monster, it deals #b1 damage to all enemies at the end of turn for the rest of combat as long as you have at least 1 #yNaturia monster summoned.
When you #yTribute a #ySuperheavy for another #ySuperheavy, gain #b1 #yDexterity.
When you #yTribute a #yMachine for another #yMachine, gain #b1 #yArtifact.
#yPassive: At the start of turn, apply a random debuff with #b1 stack to a random enemy. NL #yEvoke: Add a #yrandomized #yFiend to your hand.
If an #yImmortal card is in the discard pile, gain [E] at the start of turn.
50% chance to trigger the action given after this keyword.
#yOrb: Deal damage to ALL enemies, gain #yEnergy and #yBlock. NL #yGate is unaffected by #yFocus.
